Parameters.Name: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – TOPIC SUB-TREE IN PULLMESSAGES FILTER
Parameters.Description: To verify that the DUT supports ‘//.’ operation in topic filter in the Topic Expressions.

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: MaxPullPoints=1
Test.Description: MaxPullPoints=1 Check that DTT does not send CPPS

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: MaxPullPoints=0
Test.Description: MaxPullPoints=0 Check that DTT does not send CPPS

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: No propery events: check used inretaction window

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: DUT sends equal endpoint references (MaxPullPoints=2)
Test.Description: MaxPullPoints=2 Check that DTT sends 2 CPPS

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: Skipped MaxPullPoints

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: comparing by Id: (MaxPullPoints=2) - correct - simple structure
Test.Description: MaxPullPoints=2 Check that DTT sends 2 CPPS

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: comparing by Id: (MaxPullPoints=2) - correct - complicated structure
Test.Description: MaxPullPoints=2 Check that DTT sends 2 CPPS

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: comparing by Id: (MaxPullPoints=2) - incorrect - simple structure
Test.Description: MaxPullPoints=2 Check that DTT sends 2 CPPS

Test.TestName: REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – MAXIMUM SUPPORTED NUMBER OF NOTIFICATION PULL POINTS
Test.Name: comparing by Id: (MaxPullPoints=3) - incorrect - complicated structure
Test.Description: MaxPullPoints=2 Check that DTT sends 2 CPPS
